item.title: How to contribute and create UI tests
item.description: How to contribute and create UI tests Architecture Page Object Model (also called Page Object Pattern) is a way to organize your code in a test framework. It encourages you to separate your test logic from your page manipulation logic. Our team uses POM as an architecture to organize the code: on one side we have our page logic, and on the other side we have our test logic. The goal is to write your test code once, and only change the page logic when someone updates the application.
